sql-select.name: GetDatabasesMirroringStatus
Databases Mirroring Status
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSD.[name] AS [DatabaseName] ,CASE WHEN (tSDM.[mirroring_state] = 4) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS [DatabaseMirroringStateIsIssue] ,tSDM.[mirroring_state_desc] AS [DatabaseMirroringStateDesc] ,tSDM.[mirroring_role_desc] AS [DatabaseMirroringRoleDesc] ,tSDM.[mirroring_partner_name] AS [DatabaseMirroringPartnerName] ,tSDM.[mirroring_partner_instance] AS [DatabaseMirroringPartnerInstance] ,tSDM.[mirroring_witness_name] AS [DatabaseMirroringWitnessName] ,CASE WHEN (tSDM.[mirroring_witness_state] = 1) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS [DatabaseMirroringWitnessStateIsIssue] ,tSDM.[mirroring_witness_state_desc] AS [DatabaseMirroringWitnessStateDesc] FROM [master].[sys].[database_mirroring] tSDM LEFT OUTER JOIN [master].[sys].[databases] tSD ON tSD.[database_id] = tSDM.[database_id] WHERE tSDM.[mirroring_guid] IS NOT NULL AND ISNULL(@isShowMirroringIssuesOnly, 0) = 0 OR ( ISNULL(@isShowMirroringIssuesOnly, 0) = 1 AND ( tSDM.[mirroring_state] <> 4 OR tSDM.[mirroring_witness_state] <> 1 ) ) ORDER BY tSD.[name];
